people.description: A person with short brown hair and glasses is facing the camera, wearing a TreeHacks 2026 badge around their neck. The badge is a green PCB with "TREE HACKS" and "2026" text, along with graphics like a rocket ship, stars, and a planet. The person is wearing a black hoodie with a blue patterned design.
A person wearing a yellow hoodie and glasses is walking from left to right in the background, not facing the camera.
A person wearing a gray hoodie is walking from right to left in the background, not facing the camera.
A person wearing a black hoodie is partially visible on the far right, not facing the camera.
